verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:52
verses.text: And Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:53
verses.text: And the families of Kirjath–jearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:54
verses.text: The sons of Salma; Beth–lehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:55
verses.text: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
